event.description: Melvin Upton flies out to right fielder Rocco Baldelli.
Carl Crawford walks.
Evan Longoria homers (11) on a fly ball to center field. Carl Crawford scores.
Carlos Pena flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Pat Burrell flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Jason Bartlett flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Gabe Kapler grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Akinori Iwamura doubles (12) on a fly ball to right fielder Rocco Baldelli.
With Dioner Navarro batting, Akinori Iwamura steals (6) 3rd base.
Dioner Navarro lines out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Melvin Upton grounds out, shortstop Julio Lugo to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Carl Crawford strikes out swinging.
Evan Longoria strikes out swinging.
Carlos Pena strikes out swinging.

Jason Bartlett strikes out swinging.
With Gabe Kapler batting, Pat Burrell steals (1) 2nd base, . Pat Burrell advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Gabe Kapler strikes out swinging.

Dioner Navarro singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jason Bay. Akinori Iwamura to 2nd.

Pitching Change: Hunter Jones replaces Jon Lester.

Akinori Iwamura grounds into a force out, fielded by shortstop Julio Lugo. Pat Burrell scores. Jason Bartlett to 3rd. Gabe Kapler out at 2nd. Akinori Iwamura to 1st.
Dioner Navarro pops out to shortstop Julio Lugo.
Melvin Upton singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Jason Bay.
Carl Crawford doubles (7) on a fly ball to left fielder Jason Bay. Melvin Upton to 3rd.
Hunter Jones intentionally walks Evan Longoria.
Carlos Pena doubles (6) on a line drive to right fielder Rocco Baldelli. Melvin Upton scores. Carl Crawford scores. Evan Longoria to 3rd.

Pat Burrell grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Takashi Saito intentionally walks Jason Bartlett.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ben Zobrist replaces Gabe Kapler.
Ben Zobrist singles on a line drive to right fielder Rocco Baldelli. Evan Longoria scores. Carlos Pena scores. Jason Bartlett to 3rd.
Akinori Iwamura out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Jason Bartlett scores.
Dioner Navarro flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Defensive Substitution: Nick Green replaces third baseman Mike Lowell, batting 5th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: George Kottaras replaces catcher Jason Varitek, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Pitching Change: Javier Lopez replaces Takashi Saito.
